name: Go Back
description: Go back to the previous webpage

name: Go Forward
description: Go back to the previous webpage

name: Scroll to Top
description: Scroll to the top of the webpage

name: Scroll to Bottom
description: Scroll to the bottom of the webpage

name: Link in New Tab
description: Open a link in a new tab

name: Translate Page
description: Translate the current webpage with service of your choice

name: Copy URL
description: Copy the current webpage URL to the clipboard

name: Toggle Fullscreen
description: Toggle fullscreen mode for the webpage

name: Clear Data
description: Clear the local storage/cookie of the webpage

name: Add to Favorites
description: Add the current webpage to favorites/bookmarks
